properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '자취레시피'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, BOARDLIKE_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD_LIKE L ON (BOARD_NO = L.BOARDLIKE_NO) WHERE BOARD_NAME = '자취레시피' AND B.STATUS = 'Y') A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
